parameters.html:
<style>
body {
  margin: 0;
  height: 100vh;
  overflow: hidden;
  background: #8c96ee; /* Set background color */
  will-change: background-position; /* Hint to optimize rendering */
  position: relative; /* Ensure pseudo-element is positioned correctly */
}

body::before {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background-image: 
    url('/images/background/star.png'),
    url('/images/background/star.png');
  background-size: 96px 96px; /* Size of the image */
  background-repeat: repeat; /* Repeat the image */
  background-position: 0 0, 96px 96px; /* Offset second layer by 50% */
  animation: move-images 30s linear infinite; /* Infinite animation */
  z-index: -1; /* Place behind other content */
}

@keyframes move-images {
  0% {
    background-position: 0 0, 96px 96px;
  }
  100% {
    background-position: 96px 96px, 288px 288px; /* Move background to create seamless loop */
  }
}
</style>

parameters.text: Found a bug?  Have some feedback?  Looking for other people playing Animal Crossing on Gamecube?
This application collects personal and usage data to improve services and ensure security.

RetroAchievements.org recently released support for Gamecube games, which included Animal Crossing.  

I wasn't super impressed that there were no apps or websites specific to Animal Crossing on Gamecube that had the features I wanted, so I made my own.

This app was built in Noodl, and is hosted on Github Pages.

I make websites and apps that nobody else wants to make.  I aim to create top-notch apps and websites for niche products and games.

If you appreciate what I do, and want to keep all my apps ad-free, please spread the word, follow me on Github, or support me on Ko-fi.

parameters.html:
<style>
  body {
    margin: 0;
    height: 100vh;
    overflow: hidden;
    background: repeating-linear-gradient(
      -45deg,
      #595959,
      #595959 10px,
      #707070 10px,
      #707070 20px
    );
    background-size: 200% 200%;
    animation: move-stripes 60s linear infinite;
    will-change: background-position; /* Hint to optimize rendering */
  }

  @keyframes move-stripes {
    0% {
      background-position: 100% 100%;
    }
    100% {
      background-position: 0% 0%;
    }
  }
</style>

<style>
body {
  margin: 0;
  height: 100vh;
  overflow: hidden;
  background: #ffacbe; /* Set background color */
  will-change: background-position; /* Hint to optimize rendering */
  position: relative; /* Ensure pseudo-element is positioned correctly */
}

body::before {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background-image: 
    url('/images/background/art.png'),
    url('/images/background/art.png');
  background-size: 96px 96px; /* Size of the image */
  background-repeat: repeat; /* Repeat the image */
  background-position: 0 0, 96px 96px; /* Offset second layer by 50% */
  animation: move-images 30s linear infinite; /* Infinite animation */
  z-index: -1; /* Place behind other content */
}

@keyframes move-images {
  0% {
    background-position: 0 0, 96px 96px;
  }
  100% {
    background-position: 96px 96px, 288px 288px; /* Move background to create seamless loop */
  }
}
</style>
